name: Jump N Drop
description:
A 2D puzzle platformer game where you drop jumps when you use them!

Whenever you jump in this game you drop a 'jump token' of which you only have a limited number, but in this game when you reach the exit you turn into a red cube and must do the level in reverse - so make sure to leave these jumps in a good location for yourself!

Also includes a fully functional level editor for trying out your own creations.

All done with only a single script file in the Unity3D Game Engine for the One Script Jam

INSTRUCTIONS:
Arrow Keys or WASD to move
ESC/P to pause the game/access the menu
The aim of the game is to reach the blue exit, then upon turning red, go back and reach the red exit
You drop jump tokens when you use them so make sure to only use them if you need them, and to leave them in a place you might be able to pick them back up later!

Developed by: Katie Gardner

Music and sound effects: created with Garageband
Sprites: made in Krita

Special thanks to Twibib for inspiration, ideas for level design and testing my game
